Actions.Name: Get activities
Actions.Description: Retrieve categories of activities (astronomy, hiking, wildlife watching, etc.) possible in national parks.

Actions.Name: Get park activities
Actions.Description: Returns activites parks information.

Actions.Name: Get alerts
Actions.Description: Retrieve alerts (danger, closure, caution, and information) posted by parks.

Actions.Name: Get amenities
Actions.Description: Retrieve the amenity types (accessible restrooms, fire pit, picnic area, etc.) available in national parks.

Actions.Name: Get park amenities
Actions.Description: Retrieve places within national parks that have different amenities.

Actions.Name: Get visitor center amenities
Actions.Description: Retrieve visitor centers within national parks that have different amenities.

Actions.Name: Get articles
Actions.Description: Retrieve articles created by national parks and other NPS entities.

Actions.Name: Get campgrounds
Actions.Description: Retrieve data about National Park Service campgrounds including addresses, contacts, description, hours of operation, etc.

Actions.Name: Get events
Actions.Description: Retrieve events created by national parks and other NPS entities.

Actions.Name: Get lesson plans
Actions.Description: Retrieve lesson plans created by national parks and other NPS entities.

Actions.Name: Get news releases
Actions.Description: Retrieve news releases created by national parks and other NPS entities.

Actions.Name: Get parks
Actions.Description: Retrieve data about national parks (addresses, contacts, description, hours of operation, etc.).

Actions.Name: Get passport stamp locations
Actions.Description: Retrieve locations that have national park passport stamps.

Actions.Name: Get people
Actions.Description: Retrieve articles providing a synopsis of specific people related to national parks.

Actions.Name: Get places
Actions.Description: Retrieve articles providing a synopsis of specific places related to national parks.

Actions.Name: Get things to do
Actions.Description: Retrieve suggested things to do recommended by and for specific national parks.

Actions.Name: Get topics
Actions.Description: Retrieve categories of topics (American revolution, music, women's history, etc.) relating to national parks.

Actions.Name: Get parks by topic
Actions.Description: Retrieve national parks that are related to particular categories of topics (American revolution, music, women's history, etc.).

Actions.Name: Get tours
Actions.Description: Retrieve tours with stops at the special places, campgrounds, and visitor centers found within national parks.

Actions.Name: Get visitor centers
Actions.Description: Retrieve data about National Park Service visitor centers including addresses, contacts, description, hours of operation, etc.

Actions.Name: Get webcams
Actions.Description: Retrieve metadata about National Park Service streaming and non-streaming web cams.
